pr_title: Fix context stack of complex type descriptor

timeline.message: Fix extra wrapper being inserted to parser-ctx-stack with complex-type
Fix context stack of complex type descriptor

timeline.author: rdulmina

timeline.bodyText:
We will lose the original context if we end the context before we complete parsing the complete type descriptor.
eg type myint int[5; error handler will look for expression after recovering ] where it should look for the semicolon.
timeline.author: rdulmina
rdulmina
